text: Glancing blow.
Solid blow, causing momentary dizziness
Mild concussion. Ears ringing, bad headache and dizziness. Some blood in the hair.
Cracked skull. Severe concussion. Wound starts bleeding immediately.
Cracked skull. Brain damage. Wound starts bleeding immediately.
Cracked skull. Ear trauma. Wound starts bleeidng immediately.
The skull shatters like a ripe melon. Really messy. Instant death.
Slight bump. Won't even leave a shiner.
Solid blow. Will leave a shiner.
Solid blow. Split a lip.
Solid blow. Caused a nosebleed.
Blunt eye trauma.
Broken nose.
Dislocated jaw.
Split lip with lost teeth.
Face mangled. Shattered jaw.
Face mangled. Shattered cheekbone.
Face mangled. Eye damaged.
Face caves in from a massive blow. Death is almost instantaneous
Barely connects.
Solid blow leaves neck stiff and sore.
Something cracks. Hard and painful to breathe, but no danger of suffocation.
Damaged windpipe. Esophagus injury.
Head tilts in an unnatural angle. Neck snapped. Instant death.
Bump.
Distracting buzzing sensation.
Minor shoulder fracture makes the arm hard to use.
Torn tendons.
Shoulder caves in with broken bones. Arm useless.
Thump.
Will leave a bruise.
Swollen bruise makes arm hard to use.
Fractured humerus. Arm disabled until fixed.
Open humerus fracture. Arm useless.
Slight bump.
Funny bone effect.
Solid blow hits the bone. Whole arm buzzes and fingers are numb.
Elbow bandly strained or concussed. Swelling. Arm useless.
Elbow shattered. Arm useless.
Minor bump. Barely notice it.
Arm knocked aside, some bruising.
Brutal blow knocks arm aside. Sudden movements are painful
Radius fractured with blinding pain.
Open compound fracture with severed blood veseels.
Blow connects to the hand.
Hand knocked aside, some bruising.
Fingers smashed.
Hand or wrist mangled with some fingers disabled.
Hand completely crushed.
Bump.
Solid blow, minor brusing.
Knocks out the wind. Bad brusing. Taking deep breaths is going to be painful for a while.
Mighty upwards blow fractures and dislocates the shoulder. Arm disabled until fixed.
Several broken ribs and internal bleeding. Punctured lung.
Thump.
Solid blow, minor brusing.
Knocks out the wind. Bad brusing. Taking deep breaths is going to be painful for a while.
Fractured ribs. Chest swells up and painful to breathe.
Several broken ribs and internal bleeding. Punctured lung.
Bump.
Blow to the gut forces to bend over.
Knocks out the wind. Bad bruising and concussed organs.
Ruptured internal organs and internal bleeding.
Damage to internal organs causes heavy internal bleeding.
Some torn skin, a ittle blood.
Grazed scalp or temple. Surprising amount of blood.
Long graze along the skull. Serious bleeding.
Skull is pierced. Brain damaged.
The brain is pierced. Body goes limp and collapses. Instant death.
A graze, but nothing serious.
Grazed cheek. Surprising amount of blood.
Scarring slice on cheekbone.
Part of the face pierced, but misses the brain. It's bad. Hideous scar on jaw.
Head pierced through the eye. Body goes limp and collapses. Death is instantaneous.
Just a sting.
Deflected by collarbone. Some blood.
Pierced above the collarbone, missing major blood vessels.
Throat is pierced, damaging the windpipe.
Neck is pierced, severely damaging the carotid artery.
Shoulder grazed.
Skids off the shoulder. Stings pretty bad.
Skids off the bone. Not much blood, but hurts.
Shoulder pierced.
Shoulder pierced. Bad bleeding.
Stings like a famished horse fly.
Bicep laceration.
Deeper flesh wound on the outer arm.
Passes through the arm, chipping the bone.
Goes clean through the arm, tearing the flesh. Major blood vessel cut.
Grazed.
Sting leaves a bad funny bone effect.
Solid blow hits the bone. Fingers are numb for a while.
Pierces elbow area and damages bone. Arm useless until healed.
Elbow broken. Open frature. Arm useless with a lot of blood.
Glancing blow leaves a scratch.
Glancing blow leaves a cut.
Punctures skin and hits bone with pain running through the whole arm
Passes through the arm, missing bone. Lots of blood.
Passes through the arm, spurting blood. Major blood vessel cut.
Stings, but nothing serious.
Minor puncture of hand or fingers.
Deeper puncture for hitting bone.
Hand pierced with lots of blood.
Hand pierced. Lost a finger.
Blow grazes skin and muscle, but is deflected by bone.
Long, shallow wound along the ribs.
Most of the softer tissue under in armpit is messed up.
Pierces deep, but slides along the ribs and misses major organs. Roll for item drop.
Pierced heart. Death is almost instantaneous
Blow grazes skin and muscle, but is deflected by bone.
Long, shallow wound along the ribs.
Pierces ribcage, but misses major organs.
Punctured lung leads to stabbing pain, shortness of breath and eerie sucking sound with bubbles in the blood.
Pierced heart. Death is almost instantaneous

Grazed scalp or temple. Surprising amount of blood.
Long graze along the skull. Serious bleeding.
Skull is pierced. Brain damaged.
Massive organ damage. Death is imminent.
A graze, but nothing serious. Some blood in the hair.
Small cut, hair thick with blood. Itches like hell.
Flap of loose scalp. Dizziness and bleeding.
Deep cut with skull intact. Dizziness and bleeding.
Cracked skull and a lot of blood. Severe concussion.
Cracked skull and a lot of blood. Brain damage.
Cracked skull and a lot of blood. Ear trauma.
The skull cracks open like an egg, blood spurting high in the air. Instant death.
Small cut on cheek, some blood.
Handsome scar on cheek, some blood.
Ugly scar on forehead.
Face mangled. Shattered jaw.
Cerebellum destroyed in a fountain of blood. Instant death.

A close shave. Trickle of blood.
Lacerates throat. Eerie sucking noise and difficult to breathe.
Jugular vein cut. Lots of blood.
Total or near-total decapitation in a fountain of blood. Instant death.
Shaves off some skin.

Deeper flesh wound on the outer arm.
Blade cuts to the bone. Lots of blood.
Arm severed clean at the shoulder in a spray of blood. Barely a stump remains.
Shaves off some skin.
Long gash by the elbow.
Deeper flesh wound on the outer arm.
Blade bites through the muscle and reached bone on the outer arm.

Small cut, but funny bone effect.
Solid blow hits the bone. Fingers are numb for a while.
Mangled elbow renders arm useless with pain extending to the fingers. Drop item.
Arm severed at the elbow in a spray of blood.
Light slash along the forearm. Some blood.
Long but shallow gash. Bleeds a lot.
Nasty cut damages ulnar nerve. Fingers are numb.
Arm broken with a lot of blood.
Forearm completely mangled
Grazed hand.
Small cut, but hand flinches from the pain.
Deep, bleeding cut on hand.
Some fingers lost.
Hand completely mangled.
Minor slash. Some torn skin.
Nasty cut scrapes on the ribs, but does little damage.
Deep gash with enough force to fracture ribs and knock the wind out of you.
Cleaves through the flesh and reaches bone.
Arm severed at a shoulder in a spray of blood.
Minor slash. Some torn skin.
Nasty cut scrapes on the ribs, but does little damage.
Deep gash with enough force to fracture ribs and knock the wind out of you.
Cut goes deep, breaking and fracturing ribs. Lots of internal bleeding.
Weapon lodged in chest. Death is imminent.
Just a red slash.
Painful, bleeding cut. Looks worse than it is.
Deeper cut that bleeds hard. No organ damage.
Nasty cut with a lot of blood and some internal damage.
Total disembowelment with entrails everywhere. Legs buckle and the blood keeps coming. Death is imminent.
Glancing blow.
Surface wound. Painful, but nothing serious.
A deep gash in the fleshy parts.
